hindu_woman.text: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. “Now we are engaged in a great civil war, testing whether that nation, or any nation so conceived and so dedicated, can long endure. We are met on a great battlefield of that war.
hindu_woman.instruct: A solemn, rhythmic, and authoritative historical narration from an Indian woman.
hindu_woman.ref_text: She used to go for the concerts, traveling in a third class. If it was an overnight journey, she didn't sleep. And as I grew, she started taking with me along, a little bit of assistance from my side, playing the tantra and that sort of a thing. And I do remember that I used to keep my head on my mother's shoulder and I used to just travel throughout the night. And then that was a time when our D

hindu_man.text: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. “Now we are engaged in a great civil war, testing whether that nation, or any nation so conceived and so dedicated, can long endure. We are met on a great battlefield of that war.
hindu_man.instruct: A deep, gravelly, rhythmic Western drawl. Slow, punctuated delivery with a weary, authoritative grit.
hindu_man.ref_text: as the daughter of the great vocalist, Mogubai Kurdikar. Your father passed away when you were very small and your mother must have had to endure a great deal of hardship to bring you up and your family. What were those early days of struggle like?

duke_gettysburg.text: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. “Now we are engaged in a great civil war, testing whether that nation, or any nation so conceived and so dedicated, can long endure. We are met on a great battlefield of that war.
duke_gettysburg.instruct: A deep, gravelly, rhythmic Western drawl. Slow, punctuated delivery with a weary, authoritative grit.
duke_gettysburg.ref_text: This that the White Man calls charity is a fine thing for widows and orphans, but no warrior can accept it, for if he does, he is no longer a man and when he is no longer a man, he is nothing and better off dead.

mandarin_woman.text: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent a new nation, conceived in liberty, and dedicated to the proposition that all men are created equal. “Now we are engaged in a great civil war, testing whether that nation, or any nation so conceived and so dedicated, can long endure. We are met on a great battlefield of that war.
mandarin_woman.instruct: A natural, clear English narration with a slight cultural inflection..
mandarin_woman.ref_text: 前几天在浴室书写时,面对着镜子,突然发现左上角的头发闪立一丝营光。是窗外照进来的阳光反射吗?我用梳子剥博,营光还停在同一个地方,臭金镜子一条,原来是一根白头发。我用手翻翻头发,想看看是不是还有其他的白发,或是半白半黑的头发。我现在倒草对立找银针似的刘博者发丝,没有,他是唯一的一根。这是头一会发现自己长了根白发,我好奇的用手调弃他,透过镜子仔细观察。这跟头发看起来有点像是龙口粉丝般浅白透明
